StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProgramE.ec.veDates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramId int AS
SELECT P.PROGRAM_CODE, P.PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION, P.PROGRAM_TYPE, P.INCEPTION_DATE, CONVERT(varchar(11), PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE, 106) as PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE, PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE FROM PROGRAM P, PROGRAM_CRITERIA PC WHERE P.PROGRAM_ID = PC.PROGRAM_ID and P.PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramId ORDER BY PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE DESC
